bibl.title: Sterling P. White v. Territory of Washington. Cost Bill
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

div1.p:
Territory of Washington
County of Lincoln} ss

Territory of Washington
vs.
S. P. White
Sheriff Cost Bill in the above entitled case.

I hereby certify that by virtue of a committment which is hereto annexed. I received the above named defendant into my custody in the sixth day of January A.D. 1885 and I further certify that on the tenth day of February AD 1885 I received a writ of Habeas Corpus filed out of the Disctrict Court of Fourth Judicial District of Washington Territory, and that I answered said writ according to the commands therein, and the said writ was tried according to the papers filed herewith.

And I further certify that I was ordered by prosecuting atty. S. C. Hyde to without subpoenas all persons knowing anything about the case be in attendance and give evidence in the trial of said writ of Habeas Corpus. The following is a correct account of all papers and processes
Served by me in the above entitled case. First to guarding prisoner 45 day from January 6th to Feb 16th at two dollars per diem $90.00
Boarding and lodging prisoner forty five days at $1.00 $45.00
Notifying the following named. Wtinesses to appear before his honor. Judge Turner at chambers in the city of Spokane Lincoln County W.T. on the 13th day of February A.D. 1885 by order of S.C. Hyde Pros. Atty. at the trial of the writ of habeas corpus in the within entitled case.
Namely
Josiah Cole, O. J. Rogers, E. A. Porteh, J. H. Porteh, C. J. Brindle, Frank Bearden, H. S. Bearden, J. S. Bearden,
Witnesses for the territory Eight names at 40 ct. each 3.20 mileage from Spokane to Brint and return one hundred, and fifty mileage in hunting up witness one hundred total mileage two hundred and fifty miles at 10ct per mile 25.00
notifying witnesses for defense five at 40ct each 2.00
Same mileage as above and already charged

one day in work in preparing room. to hold. court $3.00
one days attendance on 3.00
serving writ of Habeas Corpus 1.00
Committment 1.00
transporting prisoner from Sprague city. Lincoln co. W. T. to Yakima County W. T. Two hundred and twenty five miles 22.50
Prisoner trave on RailRoad 16.00
two days in Coveying Prisoner to jail at 6.00
Prisoner board three days at 1.00 per day 3.00
total cost of sheriff $24670
less 26.00
22070
mileage from Yakima to Sprague 25.00
24570
2500
070

Territory of Washington
County of Lincoln

I John Cody Sheriff of Lincoln county Washington Territory do hereby certify that the above bill of cost are just and the charges made therein are according to statute and that I was instructed by the prosecuting S. C. Hyde. to file the same in the above form. With the other papers filed here with. John Cody dated at Sprague Lincoln County W. T. this 16th day of February A.D. 1885

Territory of Washington
vs.
P.S. White

Filed Feb. 5th 1885
Kate W. Feuerbach
Clerk

Filed in office at
Cheney W.T. April
15-1885

Kate W. Feuerbach
Clerk
By R. Strobuch
Deputy
